channel.title: X.x Can someone Help? FAST
channel.description:
Geeeeeeeez I don't seem to get much help when I post this so here is one more detailed!!!! Ok Now hereee we go
[b]BOLD LETTERS ARE A MUST FIX BEFORE I RELEASE MY SERVER[/b]
RED LETTERS ARE A HIGHLY NEED BUT SERVER CAN BE RELEASED WITHOUT THEM RIGHT NOW
How do you add quests to you're server? Im not focusing on custom quests... I really more want runescape based quests like Cooks assistant!
[b]How do you add emote's to you're server? I JUST FIGURED OUT HOW TO ADD THEM I JUST NEED THEM TO APPEAR IN MY EMOTES TAB[/b]
[b] Why does my yell command automatically yell stuff like when I do a command say like ::varrock it will say the last couple of letters like it will do ::yell ck along with my command!!! So that is a must fix.. I keep hearing the command is screwed up so can someone give me a good command if that's the case...[/b]
[b] With my client Galkons Base.. When I do a command that brings up a window let's say ::bank It will disconnect and connect me back in... It works with Silab but I want it to work with mine... (A person said it's a client interface problem so if someone could give a tut on how to fix THANKS!!!!!!!!!!!!!![/b]
How do you make a bow shoot long range? Cause whenever I shoot it will go up to enemy then shoot. Also how do you make it so arrows are on ground
[b] A GOOD SHOP.CFG THIS IS A MUST NEED FOR MY SERVER!!! JUST A BIG ONE WHATEVER YOU CAN FIND. (Try not to have it so rares are in every shop)[/b]
MORE WILL BE POSTED AS I SEE/NEED MORE
I know that narrows it down to what really needs to be answered but I really need this quick
Yes I have searched these multiple times
THANKS SO MUCH FOR HELPING!!!!
EDIT Ok people say it's my source it's not... I tried another source it doesn't work... So don't tell me it's my server unless you got proof and you can fix it...
Ok this is what's up.. Whenever I do the ::bank command OR open up a shop manually it will d/c and then log me back in... This needs to be fixed... Also as i've seen in freescapepkz when you change you're character in the ::char command and log out and back in it would of saved you're character.. As of my server that does not happen.. So if someone could give me a solution to these.
If it's command issues and It's coded wrong please post below a little tut with you're code and how to add it and how many parts etc... Please help me quick with this I can't release my server possibly source (would be a great one)
Thanks SO MUCH,
Check my sig

item.title: X.x Can someone Help? FAST
item.dc:creator: @n0mansland n0mansland
item.description:
@n0mansland wrote:

yell command should work

Read full topic

item.title: X.x Can someone Help? FAST
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

Nope it still dont work =/[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2008, 05:56:00 pm[/size][hr]Ok this is what it was before

[code]}
else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();
    }
        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }[/code]

Now It’s

[code]}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();
    }
        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2008, 01:08:07 pm[/size][hr]SO anyone/[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2008, 06:47:48 am[/size][hr]Thanks for the help guys x.x

Read full topic

item.title: X.x Can someone Help? FAST
item.dc:creator: @ilovelamp ilovelamp
item.description:
@ilovelamp wrote:

change you’re yell command from

command.startsWith
to [code] command.equalsIgnoreCase [/code] not sure if the startsWith part is actually what it say, but just change the beginning of the command and BE CAREFUL yell commands are usually around a lot of commands that will be hard to fix, like ::bank

Read full topic

item.title: X.x Can someone Help? FAST
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

I’ve tried about 3 different yell commands and their all messed up… >.< Including one from other sources

Read full topic

item.title: X.x Can someone Help? FAST
item.dc:creator: @ilovelamp ilovelamp
item.description:
@ilovelamp wrote:

for the yell command, yes it’s screwed up, either look at the command and fix it, or delete it, then paste another person’s yell command where the original one was

item.title: X.x Can someone Help? FAST
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

Geeeeeeeez I don’t seem to get much help when I post this so here is one more detailed!!! Ok Now hereee we go

BOLD LETTERS ARE A MUST FIX BEFORE I RELEASE MY SERVER

RED LETTERS ARE A HIGHLY NEED BUT SERVER CAN BE RELEASED WITHOUT THEM RIGHT NOW

How do you add quests to you’re server? Im not focusing on custom quests… I really more want runescape based quests like Cooks assistant!

How do you add emote’s to you’re server? I JUST FIGURED OUT HOW TO ADD THEM I JUST NEED THEM TO APPEAR IN MY EMOTES TAB

Why does my yell command automatically yell stuff like when I do a command say like ::varrock it will say the last couple of letters like it will do ::yell ck along with my command!!! So that is a must fix… I keep hearing the command is screwed up so can someone give me a good command if that’s the case…

With my client Galkons Base… When I do a command that brings up a window let’s say ::bank It will disconnect and connect me back in… It works with Silab but I want it to work with mine… (A person said it’s a client interface problem so if someone could give a tut on how to fix THANKS!!!

How do you make a bow shoot long range? Cause whenever I shoot it will go up to enemy then shoot. Also how do you make it so arrows are on ground

A GOOD SHOP.CFG THIS IS A MUST NEED FOR MY SERVER!!! JUST A BIG ONE WHATEVER YOU CAN FIND. (Try not to have it so rares are in every shop)

MORE WILL BE POSTED AS I SEE/NEED MORE

I know that narrows it down to what really needs to be answered but I really need this quick

Yes I have searched these multiple times

THANKS SO MUCH FOR HELPING!!!

EDIT
Ok people say it’s my source it’s not… I tried another source it doesn’t work… So don’t tell me it’s my server unless you got proof and you can fix it…

Ok this is what’s up… Whenever I do the ::bank command OR open up a shop manually it will d/c and then log me back in… This needs to be fixed… Also as i’ve seen in freescapepkz when you change you’re character in the ::char command and log out and back in it would of saved you’re character… As of my server that does not happen… So if someone could give me a solution to these.

If it’s command issues and It’s coded wrong please post below a little tut with you’re code and how to add it and how many parts etc… Please help me quick with this I can’t release my server possibly source (would be a great one)

Thanks SO MUCH,
